markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Symphony of the Unfettered Heart](/Feats.aspx?ID=4615) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You learn the [_symphony of the unfettered heart_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1777) [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=559) spell, which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.
name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
